Uses of Interface
suncertify.util.RemoteObservable

Packages that use RemoteObservable
suncertify.gui The GUI package contains all classes relating to the Swing-based GUI, both the server GUI and the client GUIs (networked and standalone client). 
suncertify.rmi The RMI package contains the classes that provide network connectivity between server and client using RMI. 
suncertify.util The utilities package is the place for general, GUI-unrelated utility classes that are basically project-independent and might be deployed unchanged in the context of many other projects. 
 

Uses of RemoteObservable in suncertify.gui
 

Methods in suncertify.gui with parameters of type RemoteObservable
 void NetworkClientView.update(RemoteObservable obs, java.lang.Object arg)
          Called from the server application when the server is about to be shutting down.
 

Uses of RemoteObservable in suncertify.rmi
 

Subinterfaces of RemoteObservable in suncertify.rmi
 interface ContractorManagerRemote
          The ContractorManagerRemote interface enables the network client not only to remotely access the business services methods (by extending Remote and BusinessServices), but also to be a remote observer itself getting notification about an imminent server shutdown (by implementing RemoteObservable).
 

Classes in suncertify.rmi that implement RemoteObservable
 class ContractorManagerRemoteImpl
          Server-side skeleton implementation of the remote contractor manager.
 

Uses of RemoteObservable in suncertify.util
 

Classes in suncertify.util that implement RemoteObservable
 class Observable
          Distributed version of the standard Java Observable class that uses the exact same API as the Java class.
 

Methods in suncertify.util with parameters of type RemoteObservable
 void RemoteObserver.update(RemoteObservable o, java.lang.Object arg)
          Called whenever the observed object is changed.
